entries.title: Hybrid workers don't want to return to the office. But soon, they might have to
entries.description: As energy bills skyrocket and companies brace themselves for a recession, hybrid work might be about to face its biggest challenge.

entries.title: iPhone 14 early hands-on: The camera is where all the Action is
entries.description: The iPhone 14 doesn't have as many upgrades as the iPhone 14 Pro, but if camera quality is your main focus, then you're in luck.

entries.title: I had a nightmare about Apple's iPhone 14 Dynamic Island (so I contacted Apple)
entries.description: Dynamic Island is so unexpected. It's so clever. But might there be one more thing that you wish was one less thing?

entries.title: More than 20 people stood in line at the supermarket. No one wanted self-checkout
entries.description: Technology is supposed to solve so many things. Somehow, self-checkout isn't always working.

entries.title: A famous actor bought a TV at Best Buy. Now he's mad he didn't go to Costco
entries.description: When someone famous rages against your service, how should you react? In Best Buy's case, it didn't.

entries.title: The 5 best dash cams of 2022
entries.description: Dash cams are great for recording evidence of accidents and vehicle break-ins. If you're looking for the best dash cam, our expert pick is the Vantrue N2 Pro for its 1440p resolution recording, infrared night vision, motion detection, and dual view recording.
